street_special_desig_code.description: Use Street Lookup API endpoint /nsg/streets to lookup this information

Max length 300 characters
Use Street Lookup API endpoint /nsg/streets to lookup this information

special_desig_start_time.description:

proposed_start_time.description:
Required if work_type is immediate
proposed_start_time is required if proposed_start_date is in the past

proposed_end_date.description:
proposed_end_date must be on or after proposed_start_date
If work_type = planned, the maximum date range between proposed_start_date and proposed_end_date is 5 years

proposed_end_time.description:
proposed_end_time is required if proposed_end_date is in the past
proposed_end_time must be after the date and time for proposed_start_time

excavation.description: Whether an excavation will be required

works_coordinates.description: Must be a GeoJSON geometry (using British National Grid easting and northing coordinate pairs) and must be a point, line string or polygon

Required if collaborative_working = true
Max length 500 characters

collaborative_works.description:
Optional but only saved if collaborative_working = true
Max length 500 characters

pre_approval_details.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = true
Max length 500 characters

pre_approval_authoriser.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = true
Max length 100 characters

early_start_reason.description:
Required if early_start_pre_approval = false
Max length 500 characters

file_ids.description:
Array values must be unique
Must not contain null or undefined values
A file_id can only be associated with one section of Street Manager
See API specification Resource Guide > Works API > File upload for more information

workstream_prefix.description: Must consist of 3 positive whole numbers

hs2_consultation_requested_response_date.description: Date must occur today or a date in the future

hs2_highway_exemption.description: Required if work_type = 'hs2_highway_works' and hs2_in_act_limits = true

hs2_highway_emails.description:
Array Max length 2 items
Array values must be valid email addresses
Array values max length 100 characters

permit_status.description:
Can only be set to cancelled
See business rules section 3.4.9 - Cancelling PAA & PA
See business rules section 3.4.10 - PAA & PA statuses

additional_comments.description:
Required if permit_status = refused
Max length 500 characters

assessment_status.description:
Can only be set to granted, refused, permit_modification_requested or revoked
See business rules section 5 - Revoking a PA

additional_comments.description:
Required if assessment_status = refused
Max length 500 characters

reasons_for_refusal.description:
Array values must be unique
Must contain between 1 and 5 values
Required if assessment_status = refused

assessment_discount.description:
Required if assessment_status = granted and permit's work_category != hs2_highway
Is whole number between 0 and 100 inclusive

revoke_reason.description:
Required if assessment_status = revoked
Max length 500 characters

pending_change_details.description:
Required if assessment_status = permit_modification_request
Max length 500 characters

actual_start_date must be in the past
Must be after proposed start date
Permit must be granted

revert_reason.description:
revert_reason max length 500 characters
Permit must be in progress
Work must be planned
Work must not have any reinstatements

actual_stop_date.description:
actual_stop_date must be in the past
Must be after actual start date
Permit must be in progress

revert_reason.description:
revert_reason max length 500 characters
Permit must be closed
Work must be completed

reinstatement_status.description: See business rules section 8.4 - Making interim sites permanent

reinstatement_date.description:
reinstatement_date must be in the past
Must be after actual start date
Must be before actual end date (if entered)

depth.description:
Is number between 0.01 and 99.99 inclusive, to two decimal places.
Required if reinstatement type is excavation.

length.description:
Is number between 0.01 and 9999.99 inclusive, to two decimal places
Required if reinstatement type is excavation.

width.description:
Is number between 0.01 and 99.99 inclusive, to two decimal places

Will default to previously provided value or 1.

get.description: See business rules section 10 - Inspections and non-compliance

post.description: See business rules section 10 - Inspections and non-compliance
See business rules section 10.4 - Scheduling inspections

If authenticating for the first time with a temporary password, a 307 Temporary Redirect to `/authenticate/initial` will be returned,
which can be called with the same request body.

A sessionToken property may be returned from this redirect endpoint, which can be used to set a permanent password with the `/set-password`
endpoint on the Party API.

See API specification Security section for more information.
